title: Understanding Veracity
text: Veracity in nursing refers to the obligation of healthcare professionals to tell the truth and provide accurate information to patients.

title: Informed Consent
text: Informed consent is a process where a patient is given all necessary information about a medical procedure or treatment, allowing them to make an informed decision.

title: Identifying Veracity
text: Which of the following actions best represents veracity in nursing?
choices: providing information when asked to do so
